metadata.name: The Future is in Our Hands
metadata.description:
“There is a turning point in life where we can either seize the moment or miss the opportunity. This can change the future, not just yours, but the world's. The future truly is in our hands!” 

Artwork by Histibe, Renato Marques, Yan Caspar.

25% of the revenues will be used to help Ukrainians affected by the war. The project was created between Ukraine, Portugal, and Switzerland during the war in Ukraine as a symbol of the fact that art unites and has no boundaries.
